title: SunshineFreedom
author: SunshineFreedom
content: I disagree with Craigslist requiring a KYC credit card to post jobs.I am paying $100 in crypto PER AD for you to KYC and pay the $15 or less fee to hire people with certain technical skills (VPS setup, Python, graphic designer, ect).  You will need to use a local VPN to look like it's California/LA.This is a legal job, easy money.  There is no catch.Email me at:so.Where.is.the.Love@protonmail.com
